product_name: CocoHydro Coconut Water Electrolyte Drink - 25 Servings
long_description: Nothing beats fresh coconut water, but who can carry around a bundle of coconuts? Enjoy the next best thing with the 25-serving pouch of COCO HYDRO(R) Coconut Water electrolyte drink. COCO HYDRO is rich in electrolytes, including potassium, calcium, sodium, manganese and magnesium. Simply add 1 heaping tablespoon of COCO HYDRO to 8 fl. oz. of water, shake it up and drink it down. Choose your favorite flavor-Original, Pineapple or Pomegranate-Raspberry. Resealable pouch contains enough mix to make 25 servings of coconut water; pouch is easy to carry around while you're on the go. COCO HYDRO Coconut Water electrolyte drink is certified vegan and gluten free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Nothing beats fresh coconut water, but who can carry around a bundle of coconuts? Enjoy the next best thing with the 25-serving pouch of COCO HYDRO(R) Coconut Water electrolyte drink.
